title: Trial of the Grove
description: Prove your worth as a Spirit Tamer by defeating Emberfang, Mosshide, and Cloudtail in the sacred grove, earning the blessing of the Grovekeeper.

objectives.description: Defeat the Emberfang in the Cinder Glade.
Defeat the Mosshide in the Verdant Hollow.
Defeat the Cloudtail in the Skyreach.
